vclaim: The 1990s movie "Shazaam" starred comedian Sinbad as a genie.
title: Did Sinbad Play a Genie in the 1990s Movie ‘Shazaam’?
subtitle: Although many viewers claim to clearly recall comedian Sinbad's playing a genie in a movie called "Shazaam," those memories appear to be yet another example of the "Mandela Effect."
author: Dan Evon
